articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Cambodian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Cambodian King

					Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Norodom Sihamoni, King of Cambodia, on Nov. 8 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
						Kim in the message said that after independence the Cambodian people have registered great success in the work to protect the independence and sovereignty of their country and develop their national economy by waging the protracted struggle for building a new society, adding that the Korean people are rejoiced over this. He sincerely hoped that everything would go well in Cambodia.
						
						In the belief that the traditional bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation provided by President Kim Il Sung and Great King Norodom Sihanouk would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples in the future, the message wholeheartedly wished the king success in his work for the political stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Cambodian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Cambodian PM
						

					Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Hun Sen, Prime Minister of Cambodia, on Saturday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
						Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop by the common efforts of both sides in the future, the message wished the Cambodian people new progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Anniversary of Cambodian Independence Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Cambodian Independence Observed

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- Chhorn Hay, Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on November 7 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the independence of Cambodia. 
						Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here. 
						
						Staff members of the Cambodian embassy here were on hand.
						
						Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Agreement on Cultural Cooperation Inked between Governments of DPRK and Qatar
articles.content:
Agreement on Cultural Cooperation Inked between Governments of DPRK and Qatar

					
						Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cultural cooperation between the governments of the DPRK and Qatar was signed with due ceremony in Doha on Nov. 5. 
						Present there from the DPRK side were the DPRK ambassador to Qatar and his embassy official and from the Qatar side the secretary general of the Ministry of Culture, Arts and Heritages and officials concerned. 
						
						 It was inked by the ambassador and the secretary general.

articles.title: Iranian Youth Delegation Visits Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Iranian Youth Delegation Visits Kumsusan Memorial Palace

					
						Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the National Youth Organization of Iran led by its Head Mohammad Javad Haji Ali Akbari, vice-president of Iran, visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung on Sunday.
						The members of the delegation paid tribute to the President in profound reverence.
						
						The leader of the delegation wrote in the visitor's book that the President devoted his all to the people's happiness, always mixing with them.
						
						He paid highest tribute to the President, noting that his great exploits would be always remembered by the people.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations Leave for Laos and Germany
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations Leave for Germany and Laos

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Academy of Sciences headed by its President Pyon Yong Rip left here today to visit Germany. 
						A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by First Secretary of its C.C. Ri Yong Chol left here on the same day to visit Laos.

articles.title: DPRK Girls Eleven Snubs Its Danish Rival
articles.content:
DPRK Girls Eleven Snubs Its Danish Rival

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team advanced into the semifinals of the First FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup New Zealand 2008.
						The DPRK team trounced its Danish rival 4:0 in the quarterfinals played on Saturday.

articles.title: Winter Study Tour Starts in Ryanggang Province
articles.content:
Winter Study Tour Starts in Ryanggang Province

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- A winter study tour of revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in Ryanggang Province started.
						The study tour is participated in by servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people and school youth and children from across the country.
						
						The members of the group of the study tour went round the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo and the Monument bearing the poem "May immortal course of march shine" before leaving Hyesan.
						
						They placed flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung in revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites including the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, the shore of Lake Samji and the Monument to the Victorious Battles in the Musan Area and the statue of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, in the Sinpha Revolutionary Site before paying tribute to him and her in humble reverence.
						
						 They deeply acquired the rare military tactics and outstanding commanding art of the President while visiting the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum and the then Command Post of the Pochonbo Battle, Police Post and Sub-county Office and other places.
						
						After arriving in Samjiyon via Posori Spring and Junghung Table Land, they are visiting various places such as the Samjiyon Grand Monument, the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum, the Paektu Hall and Chonji Health Complex.  
						
						They visited the old home of General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu, where they saw with keen attention relics preserved with care there. They once again felt high pride and self-confidence of making a revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the son of the guerilla. 
						
						They are also going round the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the area of Mt. Paektu such as the Sajabong secret camp, Chongbong, Konchang, Pegae Hill and bivouac of Mupho, the Monument to the Victorious Battles in the Musan Area, the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site and the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site.
						
						Colorful political and cultural events such as meetings to hear impressions of reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas and poem recital, a question-and-answer competition and a sports and amusement game are taking place in the course of the study tour.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Patriotic Songun Politics
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Patriotic Songun Politics

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics serves as a great banner for the nation as it promotes the advance of the June 15 era of reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
						It goes on:
						
						The national reunification policy of the Workers' Party of Korea for achieving the sovereignty and unity of the nation and national prosperity is based on the Songun politics.
						
						The Songun politics means the politics of national independence to establish the sovereignty of the nation throughout Korea and ensure the victorious advance of the cause of national reunification and patriotic politics as it helps protect peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and encourages all the compatriots to accomplish the cause of the country's reunification. 
						
						The Korean nation could greet the June 15 era of reunification thanks to the great Songun politics relying on the invincible revolutionary armed forces. The adoption of the north-south joint declaration and its vitality provide a clear testimony to the patriotic nature of the Songun politics as it reflects the Koreans' faith in the advantages of the nation and their pride in them and their unshakable will and grit to achieve reunification and prosperity by their concerted efforts.
						
						The Songun politics, a treasured sword for preserving peace, is instilling high national pride and self-esteem into all the compatriots in the north and the south and overseas, thereby helping all of them unite close under the banner of "By our nation itself." Koreans from all walks of life in the south and overseas feel highly proud of the Songun politics of the DPRK which prevents even the U.S. styling itself the world's "only superpower" from daring attack it. They are, therefore, replete with confidence and will to reunify the country and usher in a new era of national prosperity without fail if all the compatriots go united. 
						
						The Lee Myung Bak group is making desperate efforts to bring back the June 15 era of reunification to the past era of confrontation in collusion with the U.S. imperialists but they will get it nowhere. 
						
						Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean nation advancing under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: All Countries Advocating Independence Called upon to Stand up against Imperialist Forces
articles.content:
All Countries Advocating Independence Called upon to Stand up against Imperialist Forces

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- All countries desirous of independence should build and reinforce the self-reliant defence capability, keenly aware of the principle of anti-imperialist struggle and the truth of history that they should staunchly counter the force of the imperialists with force and only by doing so can they defend their sovereignty, independence and peace and ensure national prosperity and development. 
						Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
						
						It goes on:
						
						 The confrontation with the imperialist aggression forces is, in essence, a showdown and they can be beaten back only by force. 
						
						Acute confrontation is going on between the independent forces and hegemonic forces and between the peace-loving forces and the war forces in the international arena. 
						
						 It is of peculiar importance to reinforce one's own defence capability as the confrontation with the imperialist aggressor forces is a showdown. 
						
						It is of particular necessity for small countries to boost their defence capabilities. 
						
						It is a daydream for those countries to depend on big or developed countries to carve out and protect their destinies because this only leads to submission and national ruin.
						
						Having a powerful military force, the Korean people are now accelerating their advance to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, undeterred by any military pressure of the imperialists and their moves for aggression. It is the fixed faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK that to take the toughest measures backed by strength is the only way of emerging victorious in the confrontation with the U. S. imperialists and defending the country's sovereignty and socialism and it is their revolutionary mettle and mode of counter-action to respond to their hard-line policy with the toughest measures and counter force with force under the banner of Songun. The U.S. policy of strength will never work on the DPRK but prove futile. 
						
						The imperialists and reactionaries dare not commit aggression and war when the world progressive countries and nations firmly defend their countries with their own military forces, concludes the article.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Called for

					
						Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- In order to independently achieve the country's reunification in conformity with the will and desire of the Koreans it is necessary to thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for putting it into practice, observes Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
						It goes on:
						
						The historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as an immortal programme in the era of independent reunification. These declarations comprehensively deal with all principled issues of properly solving the issue of national reunification.
						
						How to approach the above-said declarations is a touchstone to discern patriotism from treachery and reunification from division.
						
						All Koreans who love the country and the nation and aspire after the country's reunification should support and uphold the said declarations and resolutely turn out in the patriotic struggle to implement them regardless of whether they live in the north and the south and overseas.
						
						In order to thoroughly implement the said declarations, it is necessary, first of all, to foil the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and firmly preserve them. 
						
						The Koreans are called upon to dynamically wage a nationwide struggle to check and frustrate such criminal acts of the Lee Myung Bak group as negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and pursuing confrontation and war.
						
						In order to thoroughly implement the said declarations, it is also necessary to achieve the unity of all the pro-reunification and patriotic forces at home and abroad true to the idea of "By our nation itself."
						
						Unity guarantees the victory of the movement for national reunification.
						
						The cause of independent reunification is sure to be accomplished thanks to the outstanding Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the strength of the nation united close under the banner of the country's reunification and the great reunification programme common to the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' "Recommendation" to Rewrite History Textbooks Turned Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' "Recommendation" to Rewrite History Textbooks Turned Down

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- History textbook writers of south Korea called a press conference on Nov. 4 at which they clarified their stand to reject the puppet government's "recommendation" for rewriting history textbooks.
						They recalled that the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology of south Korea recently made "a recommendation" for revising the history textbooks which underwent screening.
						
						They accused the ministry of joining the present conservative ruling forces in the move to tamper with history under the pretext that the textbooks were "written to serve the leftist purpose."
						
						Holding that the "recommendation for rewriting the textbooks" would leave an indelible stain on the history, they urged Lee Myung Bak and the minister of Education, Science and Technology to apologize to the people.

articles.title: Damages Suit Filed against Puppet Prosecution in S. Korea
articles.content:
Damages Suit Filed against Puppet Prosecution in S. Korea

					
						Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration on Nov. 4 filed a damages suit in the Seoul Central District Court against the false results of the investigation made by the puppet prosecution into its leading members.
						The organization termed "the results of the intermediary investigation conducted into the case of the above-said solidarity" made public by the prosecution authorities on Oct. 24 sheer lies and fabrications, branding this action as an infringement on human rights as it defamed those who were arrested and prosecuted.
						
						Noting that the announcement of the results of the investigation was obviously an illegal action, the organization demanded the authorities own responsibility to compensate for the damage done to the above-said persons through false propaganda.
						
						The organization declared that it files a damages suit against the prosecution in order to help the organization and its leading members restore their honor and make sure that groundless malignant misinformation is no longer floated by media.

articles.title: Joint Actions Launched by Inhabitants near Military Bases in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Actions Launched by Inhabitants near Military Bases in S. Korea

					
						Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Inhabitants in areas near military bases in different parts of south Korea launched vigorous joint actions after forming the organization called "National Network of People in the Areas Suffering from Noise Caused by Military Bases."
						An inaugural ceremony was held in Seoul on Nov. 4.
						
						Speakers at the ceremony said that the damage done to inhabitants by the firing grounds and airfields in different parts of south Korea is further increasing as the days go by.
						
						The inhabitants in the areas near the firing grounds and airfields are suffering not only from the environmental pollution but from noise and are seized with such uneasiness that they can hardly raise even domestic animals, they deplored, and continued:
						
						This being a hard fact, the authorities are sidestepping the issue of instituting a "law" on preventing damage under the pretext of lack of funds.
						
						The speakers declared that the inhabitants in the above-said areas would go united and stage positive actions to get the problem settled.
						
						They urged the Ministry of "Defense" and the Ministry of Environment and other authorities concerned to immediately take measures and institute a "special law" on the damage done by noise, etc.

articles.title: South Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" Should Be Disbanded Forthwith
articles.content:
South Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" Should Be Disbanded Forthwith

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- The last three decades when the  south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" has existed are years of crime during which it has violated peace and increased the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.
						As already reported, the 30th UN General Assembly Session adopted a resolution calling for dissolution of the "UN Forces" in south Korea and withdrawal of the U.S. forces from there by an overwhelming majority in 1975. Flurried by this, the United States was engaged in rigging up the "Combined Forces Command" with a wicked scheme to keep south Korea as its permanent colony and military strategic base and to step up the adventurous preparations for a war to invade the north.
						
						It made public "strategic guideline No. 1" in November 1978 and thus officially announced the formation of the "Combined Forces Command" in south Korea. It saw to it that the "Combined Forces Command" took over the "UN Forces Command's" Operation Control of the U.S. forces in south Korea and puppet army.
						
						The organization of the "Combined Forces Command" deepened the military dependence of south Korea on the United States and increased the danger for an outbreak of a new war on the Korean Peninsula.
						
						The Team Spirit joint military exercises for invading the north had been escalated as a large-scale war exercises involving huge armed forces over100,000-200,000 strong from 1978. Such joint military exercises as the Reception, Staging, Onward Movement and Integration (RSOI), Ulji Focus Lens and Foal Eagle have been staged almost every day as planned and directed by the command.
						
						The aggressive and bellicose nature of the command has remained unchanged even after the June 15 era, a new era of reconciliation and cooperation, was ushered in on the Korean Peninsula.
						
						Many war scenarios against the north including "OPLAN 5030", "New OPLAN 5026" and "OPLAN 8022-02" have been worked out and war exercises to carry them into practice conducted in a more frenzied way.
						
						This year the command changed the codenames of the RSOI and Ulji Focus Lens with Key Resolve and Ulji Freedom Guardian and is holding actual maneuvers to hurl U.S. imperialist aggression forces in the mainland and abroad into Korean front.
						
						It goes without saying that such war exercises and arms buildup had have negative effect on the north-south relations and chilled the ardent desire for the Korean people for reunification.
						
						The south Korean people thus press for the dissolution of the "Combined Forces Command" disturbing peace in Korea and obstructing her reunification.
						
						The south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command", a tool for war of aggression and a source of permanent atmosphere of war and tension on the Korean Peninsula, should be disbanded without delay.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Landing Exercise Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Landing Exercise Slammed in S. Korea

					
						Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces staged the largest-ever joint landing exercises on the coast of Josa-ri, Phohang City, North Kyongsang Province, on Nov. 6.
						The landing exercises were participated in by the 31st expedition task force of the U.S. marines and the 1st division and the corps supporting the landing operation of the puppet marine corps, more than 10,000 in all, and 27 warships, at least 30 attack helicopters and aircraft and more than 70 landing armored vehicles. This madcap maneuver was watched by the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the chairman of the puppet joint chiefs of staff.
						
						Members of civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification staged a protest against the drill. 
						
						They charged that the exercises were staged according to "OPLAN 5027" for a preemptive strike against the north were basically aimed at radically raising the level of arms and combat equipment of the marine corps and boosting the commanding and control capability of the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Marines Command." 
						
						Noting that the largest-ever exercises were of more offensive nature, they held that the drill is a reckless act of escalating the military tension and confrontation on the Korean Peninsula. They strongly demanded a halt to the saber rattling.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warlike Forces' Joint War Maneuvers under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warlike Forces' Joint War Maneuvers under Fire

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee issued a statement on Nov. 3 in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean war maniacs' provocative Hoguk joint war maneuvers targeted against the DPRK.
						Branding the above-said maneuvers as war exercises for invading the DPRK through a preemptive attack, the statement noted that this once again clearly proved that the U.S. is not willing to drop its criminal aim to stifle the DPRK.
						
						If the U.S. imperialists and south Korean war maniacs persist in their reckless offensive play with fire despite the repeated warnings, they will not escape miserable destruction, it warned.

articles.title: Immediate Stop to Joint Landing Exercises Demanded
articles.content:
Immediate Stop to Joint Landing Exercises Demanded

					
						Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- 38 political parties, civic and public and youth and student organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a joint statement on Nov. 6 denouncing the warmongers' joint landing exercises for aggression.
						The statement referred to the largest-ever south Korea-U.S. joint landing exercises now underway across south Korea as part of the Hoguk joint military exercises with U.S. marines and south Korean marine corps involved.
						
						The gravity of the exercises lies in that the military exercises are now under way according to "OPLAN 5027" which has been put into a concrete shape as an offensive scenario in particular, the statement noted, and continued:
						
						The largest-ever joint landing exercises for aggression of increased offensive nature are a dangerous move to escalate the military tension and confrontation on the Korean Peninsula.
						
						 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities truly stand for denuclearization and peace on the peninsula, they should immediately halt the above-said landing exercises going against those processes.
						
						The south Korean Council of Youth Organizations on Nov. 3 issued the statement titled "The authorities are threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula, not content with forcing the people to suffer from destitution! Immediately stop the south Korea-U.S. joint landing exercises."

articles.title: Labor Done in Cuba for Friendship with Korean People
articles.content:
Labor Done in Cuba for Friendship with Korean People

					
						Pyongyang November 8 (KCNA) -- Labor was done at a Cuban steel works on Nov. 1 for friendship with the Korean people on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK.
						Participating in the friendship labor were officials of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Foreign Ministry of Cuba and the steel works and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and officials of his embassy.
						
						Prior to the labor, the participants were briefed on the history of the works and speeches were made.
						
						Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the committee, referred to the importance of the friendship labor on the occasion of the significant holiday of the Korean people.
						
						The heroic Korean people have successfully built Korean-style socialism in a brief span of time, he noted, and continued: 
						
						The Korean people are waging a vigorous struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
						
						The committee will as ever work for the reunification of Korea.
						
						The Cuban people extend invariable support and solidarity to the fraternal Korean people.
						
						The participants worked with workers of the steel works, deepening the bilateral friendship.

articles.title: Cuba: jornada de amistad con el pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Cuba: jornada de amistad con el pueblo coreano

					
						Pyongyang, 8 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia primero en la Fabrica "Cubana de Acero" la jornada de amistad.
						En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios del Instituto Cubano de Amistad con los Pueblos, el Comite Cubano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y de la mencionada fabrica, asi como el embajador y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en esa nacion antillana.
						
						Antes del inicio de la jornada, se dio a conocer el historial de la fabrica y hubo discursos.
						
						El primer vicepresidente del Comite Cubano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea, Juan Jose Leon Vega, se refirio a la importancia del trabajo de amistad organizado con motivo de esa significativa fiesta del pueblo coreano.
						
						Prosiguio que el heroico pueblo coreano construyo en un corto tiempo el magnifico socialismo al estilo coreano y libra una energica lucha por la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais.
						
						Afirmo que el Comite Cubano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea luchara en el futuro tambien por la reunificacion de Corea.
						
						Concluyo su discurso transmitiendo al hermano pueblo coreano el invariable apoyo y solidaridad del pueblo cubano.
						
						Los participantes ensancharon la amistad entre los pueblos de ambos paises trabajando con los obreros de la fabrica.

articles.title: Debe ser disuelta "Comandancia de las Fuer zas Combinadas"
articles.content:
Debe ser disuelta "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas"

					
						Pyongyang, 8 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Los 30 anos en que ha existido la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas" Surcoreano-Estadounidense son los tricenales llenos de crimenes en que se violaba la paz y se aumentaba la peligrosidad de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
						Como sabe todo el mundo,  en el XXX periodo de  sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU efectuado en 1975, fue aprobada por mayoria abrumadora la  resolucion de disolver las "Fuerzas de Naciones Unidas" en el  Sur de Corea y retirar alli las tropas norteamericanas. Perplejo de eso, EE.UU. trato de crear la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas" con el fin de apoderarse indefinidamente del Sur de Corea como su colonia y base militar estrategica y  dar mas acicate a sus aventureras maniobras belicas para invadir al Norte de Corea.
						
						En noviembre de 1978, EE.UU. promulgo la "guia estrategica No.1" para fundar la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas" en el Sur de Corea y entregar a esta la autoridad de mando operacional de la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de Naciones Unidas" a las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y el ejercito titere surcoreano.
						
						Debido a la creacion de este aparato se profundizo aun mas la dependencia militar del Sur de Corea a EE.UU. y se aumento la peligrosidad de la provocacion de nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
						
						Desde 1978 en que se fabrico la nueva comandancia, el simulacro "Team Spirit" que  suponia la agresion al Norte de Corea se fortalecio como ejercicio de gran envergadura en que participaron mas de 100 mil efectivos y, a la larga, mas de 200 mil.
						
						Bajo el plan y el mando de esta comandancia, se desarrollaron casi diariamente los "ejercicios combinados de refuerzo para tiempo de guerra",  los "Ulji Focus Lens", los "Aguilucho" y otros ejercicios militares conjuntos.
						
						Tambien, despues de iniciada la epoca del 15 de Junio para la reconciliacion y la cooperacion en la Peninsula Coreana, no cambio nada de la naturaleza  agresiva y belicosa de esta comandancia.
						
						Se trazaron el "Plan operacional 5030", "Nuevo plan operacional 5026", "Plan operacional 8022-02" y otros planes de guerra de agresion al Norte, y se libraron freneticamente los ejercicios belicos para aplicarlos en la guerra real.
						
						Tan solo en el ano en curso, la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas" sustituyo los titulos de los "ejercicios combinados de refuerzo para el tiempo de guerra" y los "Ulji Focus Lens" por los "Key Resolve" y  los "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y no cesa de desplegar los ejercicios para introducir en el frente coreano las tropas agresoras norteamericanas en el interior y exterior.
						
						Tales ejercicios belicos y aumento armamentista ejercen la mala influencia sobre las relaciones intercoreanas y desalientan el fervor de los connacionales a la reunificacion.
						
						Es por eso que el pueblo surcoreano demanda energicamente la disolucion de la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas" que perturba la paz y obstaculiza la reunificacion en Corea.
						
						Por lo tanto, debe ser disuelta sin demora la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas" Surcoreano-Estadounidense, aparato de guerra agresiva que crea  permanentemente el ambiente belico y exacerba la tension en la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a hacer frente a los imperialistas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a hacer frente a los imperialistas

					
						Pyongyang, 8 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Todos los paises aspirantes a la independencia deberan preparar y fortalecer la capacidad de autodefensa nacional teniendo presente el principio de la lucha antiimperialista y la verdad de la historia de que cuando hagan frente rotundo con la fuerza a los imperialistas, podran defender la soberania, la independencia y la paz y asegurar el desarrollo y la prosperidad de la nacion.
						Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y continua:
						
						La confrontacion con las fuerzas agresoras imperialistas es, en su esencia, la de la fuerza, que resulta el unico medio valido en el trato con ellas.
						
						Hoy dia, en la arena internacional se escenifica el agudo enfrentamiento entre las fuerzas independientes y las dominacionistas y entre los pacifistas y los belicistas.
						
						Resulta muy importante para todos los paises que consoliden sus propias fuerzas de defensa nacional.
						
						Esta cuestion resulta mas vital para los paises pequenos porque las pretensiones de defender y forjar su destino bajo el amparo de los paises grandes o desarrollados significan el camino a la sumision y arruinamiento del pais.
						
						Hoy dia, el pueblo coreano acelera la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista sin vacilacion alguna bajo cualquier presion militar y agresion de los imperialistas porque cuenta con sus poderosas fuerzas armadas. 
						
						En la confrontacion con el imperialismo norteamericano la sobredureza es la unica salvacion y el remedio para defender la soberania del pais y el socialismo. He aqui la firme conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea. 
						
						Hacer frente a la dureza con la sobredureza y a la fuerza con la fuerza bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) es el temperamento revolucionario y el modo de responder de la RPDC. 
						
						La politica de garrote del imperio nunca resultara efectiva en el trato con ella. 
						
						Si todos los paises y naciones progresistas del mundo defienden con firmeza sus territorios nacionales con sus propias fuerzas armadas, los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios no se atreveran a lanzar a su antojo la agresion y la guerra.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica de patriotica la politica de Songun
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica de patriotica la politica de Songun
						

					
						Pyongyang, 8 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual publicado este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) es la gran bandera nacional que impulsa el avance de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
						El texto resumido del articulo sigue:
						
						Sobre la politica de Songun se asienta la de reunificacion de la patria del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea para lograr la soberania, la unidad y la prosperidad nacionales.
						
						 Esta politica caracterizada por la independencia nacional y el amor por la patria y la nacion  permite establecer la soberania nacional en todo el pais y defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana e impulsa a todos los coreanos al cumplimiento exitoso de la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
						
						En virtud de esta politica basada en las invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, la nacion coreana pudo acoger la citada epoca de reunificacion.
						
						Su caracter patriotico se resalto por la aprobacion y la vitalidad de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur imbuidas de la conciencia y el orgullo de la superioridad de la nacion coreana y de la firme voluntad  y la coraje de lograr con las fuerzas unidas de ella la reintegracion territorial y la prosperidad.
						
						La politica de Songun, medio omnipotente de la defensa de la paz, agrupa a todos los coreanos del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar segun el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" poniendolos orgullosos de ser integrantes de la nacion coreana.
						
						Los compatriotas de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea y en ultramar se sienten sumamente orgullosos de esa politica, ante la cual queda impotente hasta EE.UU. autoproclamado como "unica superpotencia" del mundo, y estan bien conscientes de que si todos los connacionales unen sus fuerzas, es del todo posible reunificar la patria y dar inicio a la nueva epoca de la prosperidad nacional.
						
						A pesar de que la banda de Lee Myung Bak maniobra ahora demencial y neciamente en contubernio con los imperialistas norteamericanos para hacer regresar la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de Junio al anterior periodo de enfrentamiento, siempre habra victorias y glorias en el camino de la nacion coreana que avanza bajo la bandera del Songun en alto.
